.. _`picard CollectInsertSizeMetrics`:

PICARD COLLECTINSERTSIZEMETRICS
===============================

Collect metrics on insert size of paired end reads with picard tools.






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule insert_size:
        input:
            "mapped/{sample}.bam"
        output:
            txt="stats/{sample}.isize.txt",
            pdf="stats/{sample}.isize.pdf"
        log:
            "logs/picard/insert_size/{sample}.log"
        params:
            # optional parameters (e.g. relax checks as below)
            "VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=LENIENT "
            "METRIC_ACCUMULATION_LEVEL=null "
            "METRIC_ACCUMULATION_LEVEL=SAMPLE"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/picard/collectinsertsizemetrics"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
